ygData.subject: Re: Guild Update
ygData.msgSnippet: very resonable to me and is something that i think is almost common sense for you never know when that kind of info will come in handy
ygData.messageBody:
very resonable to me and is something that i think is almost common
sense for you never know when that kind of info will come in handy

David Lari wrote:
>
> From: David Lari <kerik@...>
>
> As of last night, the acting guild leader on Rodcet Nife is:
>
> Character:
> Genesius
> Lvl 17 Wood Elf Ranger
> Rodcet Nife
>
> Real Life:
> Robert J. Bencale rbencale@...
>
> Please contact him to get yourself 'guilded' on that server.
>
> (Rob, can I add this to our website? Let me know. Thanks)
>
> As we get other servers set up, I will let everyone know. Thanks to all who
> have helped and thanks for your patience.
>
> I am still awaiting word from the GM on E'ci as to whether she has been able
> to get the 'hijacked' version of our guild deleted.
>
> As we get guilds set up and people made into guild leaders and officers, I
> think it would be a good idea if every guild leader kept a list of all
> members and their contact information (i.e. email address). I dont' want to
> turn this into a record keeping nightmare, but I think that we at least
> should have this much information on file. Does this sound reasonable to
> everyone?
>
> Hugs,
> David
>
> Dedric on Brell Serilis
>
>
